price: (Mọryam) sọ pé: “Olúwa mi báwo ni èmi yó ṣe ní ọmọkùnrin, (nígbà tí) abara kan kò fọwọ́ kàn mí.” Ó sọ pé: Báyẹn ni Allāhu ṣe ń dá ohun tí Ó bá fẹ́. Nígbà tí Ó bá (gbèrò) láti dá ẹ̀dá kan ohun tí Ó máa sọ fún un ni pé: “Jẹ́ bẹ́ẹ̀.” Ó sì máa jẹ́ bẹ́ẹ̀.
arabic: قَالَتۡ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي وَلَدٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞۖ قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ ٱللَّهُ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālat rabbi annā yakūnu lī waladun walam yamsasnī basharun qāla kadhāliki al-lahu yakhluqu mā yashāu idhā qaḍā amran fa-innamā yaqūlu lahu kun fayakūnu
